name: Jason Winstanley
title: Budtender
coverLetter:
To whom it may concern,

I am a motivated self starter with a can do attitude who contributes highly to a strong organization with dedication,hard work and loyalty.
experience:
Rydell Dodge jeep Ram-- sold cars for 3 months.

Uber - transported passengers 2 years and drove for Checker Cab for a year before that.

Lowes home improvement for 3 years and also Home Depot for 2 years
additionalInfo: I have 10 years customer service and retail sales experience..Dealing with customers on a day to day basis is 2nd nature to me.
